knowledge_panel.description: speedball 2: brutal deluxe is a 1990 video game based on a violent futuristic cyberpunk sport that draws on elements of handball and ice hockey, and rewards violent play as well as goals. the concept of the game is very reminiscent of the 1975 film rollerball. wikipedia
